attr.name: height
attr.description: The displayed height of the resource, in CSS pixels.  -- (Absolute values only.  NO percentages)

attr.name: src
attr.description: The URL of the resource being embedded.

attr.name: type
attr.description: The MIME type to use to select the plug-in to instantiate.

attr.name: width
attr.description: The displayed width of the resource, in CSS pixels.  -- (Absolute values only.  NO percentages)

content.description: None, it is an empty element.

omission.description: Must have a start tag, and must not have an end tag.

parents.description: Any element that accepts embedded content.
